channel.title: Request For Host :(
channel.description:
Hey again, I am re-posting for a host for my server. I need a good trusty hoster who can keep up for as long as possible :o Host will get Admin spot and more if desired.
Post if you wish to host..
>>EDIT<< I am restarting computer so i be back soon..

item.title: Request For Host :(
item.dc:creator: @pkerinferno pkerinferno
item.description:
@pkerinferno wrote:

Hey I might Not be a miracle, But i recently Got a new computer, It’s hooked up And infact, Im on it right now
It’s really fast My cousin who host’s His server, said it could Hold around 100-120 Ppl,

But i dont know how to port-forward

Could host 22/7 Not 24/7 ;D

I have all the programms Im not that dumb

I know everything, Just not port-forwarding

Infact i cant get to the bit were you portforward

Router information:
adsl router 502t, D-link

If you wana add my msn add it at pkerinferno@hotmail.com

Read full topic
